CatDescriptText: The two plaques the men are holding read, "The Optimist Creed Optimist International  Promise Yourself...Robert D. Bell Optimist Club of Pittsburgh May 18, 1970 " and "The Optimist Creed Optimist International  Promise Yourself...John H. Irvin Optimist Club of Pittsburgh May 18, 1970".
TitMainTitle: Four men, three holding plaques inscribed " The Optimist Creed Optimist International," with mural of wheat on wall in background
